metaobjects.heading: WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY ABOUT US
GEAR RECOMMENDED BY EXPERTS
metaobjects.staff_body: The outdoors is somewhere I love to go when life gets stressful. It allows me to slow down and remember what an amazing part of the world we live in. Recently Ive gotten into trail running and love spending time out on the trails alone. I owe a lot to this organization and to the outdoors and trying to help equip people to get active, outside and experience some amazing adventures is something I wake up every morning excited to do.

metaobjects.author: S.M Salt Spring Island, BC
metaobjects.body: Wow! I am impressed! Contact Valhalla Pure via Facebook site about whether there was a certain brand of shoe in stock and had the pair I wanted sent from the Vernon store. The shoes were delivered to my door. All in two days. I am a very happy customer.
